author: andyc
msg: instead of protected. This is needed by those parser components
that want to insert an XML stream into the document parsing
stream and make it appear transparent. With the method being
protected, the user would have to extend the XMLEntityManager
to make the method public in addition to writing a custom
configuration that intercepted events and started the entity
using the now public method on the new subclass. It's just more
Why would someone want to insert a stream into the document
